snippet:
<link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@n8n/chat/dist/style.css" rel="stylesheet" />

<style>
  :root {
    /* Farb- & Typo-System */
    --chat--font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI",
      sans-serif;
    --chat--color-primary: #f97316;
    --chat--color-primary-shade-50: #f97316;
    --chat--color-secondary: #f97316;
    --chat--color-light: #f9fafb;
    --chat--color-dark: #020617;

    /* Fenster-Layout */
    --chat--window--width: min(420px, 100vw);
    --chat--window--height: 74vh;
    --chat--border-radius: 22px;
    --chat--header--background: transparent;
    --chat--header--color: #f9fafb;
    --chat--header--padding: 0.85rem 1.1rem;
    --chat--heading--font-size: 1rem;
    --chat--subtitle--font-size: 0.78rem;

    /* Bubbles */
    --chat--message--bot--background: #f97316;
    --chat--message--bot--color: #111827;
    --chat--message--user--background: #020617;
    --chat--message--user--color: #e5e7eb;

    /* Launcher */
    --chat--launcher--background: #f97316;
    --chat--launcher--color: #ffffff;
    --chat--launcher--border-radius: 999px;
  }

  /* --- Keyframes f√ºr subtile Animationen --- */
  @keyframes km-widget-fade-up {
    from {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(16px) scale(0.98);
    }
    to {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
    }
  }

  @keyframes km-dot-pulse {
    0%   { transform: scale(0.9); opacity: 0.85; }
    50%  { transform: scale(1.1); opacity: 1; }
    100% { transform: scale(0.9); opacity: 0.85; }
  }

  @keyframes km-launcher-pulse {
    0%   { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(15,23,42,0.45); transform: translateY(0); }
    60%  { box-shadow: 0 0 0 14px rgba(15,23,42,0); transform: translateY(-1px); }
    100% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(15,23,42,0); transform: translateY(0); }
  }

  /* --- Gesamt-Window ‚Äì Glassmorphism & Rahmen --- */
  .chat-window {
    position: relative;
    border-radius: 22px;
    overflow: hidden;
    background:
      radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(148,163,184,0.14), transparent 55%),
      rgba(15,23,42,0.96);
    border: 1px solid rgba(148,163,184,0.35);
    box-shadow:
      0 22px 60px rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.68),
      0 0 0 1px rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.75);
    backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
    font-family: var(--chat--font-family);
    animation: km-widget-fade-up 260ms ease-out;
  }

  /* Dekorativer Rand */
  .chat-window::before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    inset: -1px;
    border-radius: inherit;
    pointer-events: none;
    background: radial-gradient(
      circle at top right,
      rgba(248,250,252,0.32),
      transparent 55%
    );
    mix-blend-mode: screen;
    opacity: 0.65;
  }

  /* --- Header mit Gradient, Avatar & Online-Badge --- */
  .chat-window header {
    position: relative;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #020617 0%, #f97316 45%, #facc15 100%);
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(15,23,42,0.55);
    padding: 0.9rem 1.1rem 0.8rem;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.85rem;
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .chat-window header::before {
    content: "M";
    width: 34px;
    height: 34px;
    border-radius: 999px;
    background:
      radial-gradient(circle at 30% 0%, #ffffff, #f97316);
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #020617;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
    flex-shrink: 0;
  }

  .chat-header-text {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 0.12rem;
    min-width: 0;
  }

  .chat-header-title {
    font-size: 0.96rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #f9fafb;
    letter-spacing: 0.01em;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .chat-header-subtitle {
    font-size: 0.74rem;
    color: rgba(226,232,240,0.9);
  }

  .chat-header-chip {
    margin-left: auto;
    font-size: 0.68rem;
    padding: 0.18rem 0.55rem;
    border-radius: 999px;
    background: rgba(15,23,42,0.55);
    border: 1px solid rgba(148,163,184,0.65);
    color: #e5e7eb;
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.28rem;
    white-space: nowrap;
  }

  .chat-header-chip::before {
    content: "";
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
    border-radius: 999px;
    background: #22c55e;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(34,197,94,0.3);
    animation: km-dot-pulse 1.4s ease-in-out infinite;
  }

  /* kleiner ‚Äûpowered by‚Äú-Hint */
  .chat-header-subtitle span.km-powered {
    font-size: 0.68rem;
    opacity: 0.85;
  }

  /* --- Body / Messages --- */
  .chat-window main {
    padding: 0.8rem 0.9rem 0.95rem;
  }

  .chat-message-bot {
    border-radius: 18px 18px 18px 6px;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 24px rgba(15,23,42,0.5);
  }

  .chat-message-user {
    border-radius: 18px 18px 6px 18px;
    border: 1px solid rgba(148,163,184,0.5);
    background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(15,23,42,0.5), #020617);
  }

  /* Typografie in Nachrichten */
  .chat-message-bot p,
  .chat-message-user p {
    font-size: 0.86rem;
    line-height: 1.45;
  }

  /* --- Input-Bar / Sendebereich --- */
  .chat-input {
    border-top: 1px solid rgba(30,64,175,0.7);
    background: linear-gradient(
      to top,
      rgba(15,23,42,0.98),
      rgba(15,23,42,0.93)
    );
    padding-bottom: 0.75rem;
  }

  .chat-input textarea,
  .chat-input input[type="text"] {
    border-radius: 999px;
    border: 1px solid rgba(148,163,184,0.55);
    background: rgba(15,23,42,0.9);
    color: #e5e7eb;
    font-size: 0.86rem;
  }

  .chat-input textarea:focus,
  .chat-input input[type="text"]:focus {
    outline: none;
    border-color: #f97316;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(148,163,184,0.5);
  }

  .chat-input button {
    border-radius: 999px;
    font-weight: 500;
  }

  /* --- Launcher-Button mit Label & Pulse --- */
  .chat-launcher {
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: 0 18px 40px rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
    border: 1px solid rgba(15,23,42,0.85);
    animation: km-launcher-pulse 2.6s ease-out infinite;
    transition: transform 160ms ease-out, box-shadow 160ms ease-out;
  }

  .chat-launcher:hover {
    transform: translateY(-1px) scale(1.02);
    animation: none;
    box-shadow: 0 20px 44px rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
  }

  .chat-launcher::before {
    content: "Chat mit MB Geb√§udetechnik GmbH";
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 120%;
    right: 0;
    transform: translateY(-4px);
    background: rgba(15,23,42,0.96);
    color: #e5e7eb;
    padding: 0.18rem 0.55rem;
    border-radius: 999px;
    font-size: 0.68rem;
    border: 1px solid rgba(148,163,184,0.7);
    white-space: nowrap;
  }

  /* Mobile: Label √ºber Launcher nicht so aggressiv anzeigen */
  @media (max-width: 640px) {
    .chat-launcher::before {
      opacity: 0.9;
      font-size: 0.64rem;
      right: 4px;
    }
  }

  /* --- Mobile: App-Feeling --- */
  @media (max-width: 768px) {
    .chat-window {
      width: 100vw !important;
      max-width: 100vw !important;
      height: calc(100vh - 82px) !important;
      bottom: 0 !important;
      right: 0 !important;
      border-radius: 20px 20px 0 0;
      border-left: none;
      border-right: none;
    }
  }
</style>

<script type="module">
  import { createChat } from 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@n8n/chat/dist/chat.bundle.es.js';

  createChat({
    webhookUrl: 'https://n8n.srv1000937.hstgr.cloud/webhook/km-chat/chat',
    webhookConfig: {
      method: 'POST',
      headers: {}
    },
    mode: 'window',
    chatInputKey: 'chatInput',
    chatSessionKey: 'sessionId',
    loadPreviousSession: true,
    metadata: { tenantId: 'km-mb-gebaeudetechnik-com' },
    showWelcomeScreen: false,
    defaultLanguage: 'de',
    initialMessages: [
      'Willkommen bei MB Geb√§udetechnik GmbH! üëã',
      'Wie k√∂nnen wir Ihnen konkret weiterhelfen?'
    ],
    i18n: {
      de: {
        title: 'Chat mit MB Geb√§udetechnik GmbH',
        subtitle: 'Schnelle, pers√∂nliche Antworten zu Leistungen, Terminen & Angeboten.',
        footer: '',
        getStarted: 'Chat starten',
        inputPlaceholder: 'Kurz Ihre Frage hier eintippen ‚Ä¶'
      }
    }
  });
</script>
